evidence.claim: ExactlyIT provides services compliant with HIPAA regulations.
Their technology stack includes AWS and Azure for cloud services.
The company supports healthcare integration using FHIR and HL7 standards.
ExactlyIT utilizes APIs for data integration and processing tasks.
Their platform employs REST and SOAP APIs for service integration.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of handling X12 transactions or clearinghouse services.
